name: Rest Stop Dead
description:
Warning! This game is for 18+ Do NOT play if you're a minor

This game contains triggering topics such as assault, gore and sexual assault. viewer discretion is advised

Your recent move has you on a road trip of sorts, and what's a road trip without a rest stop? You meet Morgan, a fellow traveler with potentially malicious intent >:3. How will this chance encounter affect what the future holds for you?

the mc is customizable, and lgbt+ friendly


This is my first game, made during a 3 week course on how to make VNs. This is part of a hopefully bigger project down the line, as I gain more experience with coding and drawing.
You can find me at https://www.tumblr.com/bloodstainedbarn

Please contact me with any questions or if you find a bug!
I hope you have fun!
